APP_ID: Pukekohe High School - Design Problem and Brief
APP_TITLE: Writing a Design Problem, Brief and Specification
APP_SUBTITLE: Learning Assessment - Clear Language, Clear Evidence

ASSESSMENTS.title: Stage 1 – Writing a Design Problem and Brief
ASSESSMENTS.subtitle: Task 1

questions.id: Write a Design Problem and Brief
questions.text:
Describe the design problem and write a brief for your project.

In your response, you must:
- clearly explain what the problem or need is
- identify who the stakeholder(s) are
- explain why this is a problem and why it needs to be solved
- describe the context or situation where the problem exists
- explain what the design outcome needs to achieve (do not describe your final solution)
- include any constraints or limitations that will affect the design

Your answer should focus on the need, not the solution, and should guide the rest of your project.
questions.hint: Write in full sentences. Focus on the NEED, not the solution.

questions.text:
Write a specification for your design outcome.

Your specification must:
- be written as a list of clear criteria
- use measurable or testable language
- describe what the outcome must achieve
- include constraints and requirements

Do NOT describe your final solution.
questions.hint: Start each point with 'The outcome must…' and include numbers where possible.
